input: Making a difference without changing jobs (p. 100)
output: Here are some key ways to make a big positive impact without changing jobs: 1. Give 10% of your income to effective charities. 2. Use your political influence, such as by voting.
instruction: Consider giving to effective charities and using your political influence to make a difference.

input: Using your skills to make a difference (p. 110)
output: Using your skills to make a difference can be a great way to have an impact without changing jobs. Consider volunteering or taking on a side project.
instruction: Take some time to think about how your skills and experience could be used to make a difference.

input: Helping others have an impact (p. 120)
output: Helping others have an impact can be a great way to make a difference. Consider mentoring someone or providing support to a friend or colleague.
instruction: Think about how you can support others in making a positive impact.

input: Making a difference in your community (p. 130)
output: Making a difference in your community can be a great way to have a positive impact. Consider volunteering or getting involved in local initiatives.
instruction: Research local organizations or initiatives that align with your values and consider getting involved.

input: Using your voice to make a difference (p. 140)
output: Using your voice to make a difference can be a powerful way to create change. Consider writing to your elected officials or speaking out on social media.
instruction: Take some time to think about how you can use your voice to make a positive impact.

input: Overcoming obstacles to making a difference (p. 160)
output: Overcoming obstacles to making a difference can be challenging, but it's not impossible. Consider seeking out support from others or finding ways to overcome common obstacles.
instruction: Take some time to think about how you can overcome obstacles to making a positive impact.

input: Staying motivated to make a difference (p. 170)
output: Staying motivated to make a difference can be challenging, but it's key to creating lasting change. Consider finding ways to stay motivated, such as by celebrating small wins.
instruction: Take some time to think about how you can stay motivated to make a positive impact.

instruction: Take some time to think about how you can create a plan to make a positive impact.

input: Taking action to make a difference (p. 200)

instruction: Take some time to think about how you can take action to make a positive impact.

input: Sustaining your impact over time (p. 200)

input: Collaborating with others to make a difference (p. 230)
